name: Volantio
long_description:
Volantio is a leader in travel technology software focused on revenue and capacity optimization for airlines.  

Based in Atlanta, GA, Volantio partners with major airlines globally such as Qantas, Iberia, Alaska Airlines, Volaris, Jetstar Airways, Emirates, Ethiopian Airlines, Scoot-Tigerair, and others. 

The company’s Yana platform enables airlines to generate incremental revenue and reduce operational costs, while putting greater predictability and control back into the hands of their customers.

We are backed by institutional and strategic investors from around the world including Ingleside Investors, JetBlue Technology Ventures, International Airlines Group (IAG), and Qantas Ventures.
one_liner: Post-booking revenue and capacity optimization for airlines…

name: SkyLights
long_description:
Skylights is a wearable immersive cinematic entertainment for captive audiences.  SkyLights started in the planes, as passenger inflight entertainment.

SkyLights enables patients and passengers to tune out of their environment and escape by enjoying premium cinematic entertainment using VR headsets.

Skylights integrates content licensing deals, secure software, headset hardware, and operations. All four are sold as a subscription service. Skylights is now developing in BtoC.

The company is incorporated in the US.
one_liner: Premium immersive cinematic VR entertainment for captive audiences

name: Roame
long_description:
Roame is flight search engine design for credit card points and miles. We help travelers redeem their points for dream vacations in seconds rather than days.

At Roame, we are on a mission to revolutionize travel and consumer finance. We stand at the intersection of travel tech and fintech.
one_liner: Flight search engine using credit card points and miles

name: Forerunner AI
long_description: Forerunner is an AI-powered platform for aircraft maintenance, repair, and overhaul.
one_liner: AI that gets aircraft flying faster
